import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Container, Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import products from '../product'; export function CartPage() { const productsInCart = products.slice(0,2); return (

Your Cart

{productsInCart.map(product => (

{product.name}

 Price ${product.price} Quantity 1 2 3 4 5 ))} ) }
